scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Barbara Skalberg
scrape.text: DNF -- Audiobook and I didn't love the over dramatized way the reader read. The condescending tone in his voice became too much to listen to. That does make me wonder if I would have been able to finish if I had read instead. A quarter of the way in and I could not take another minute of the petty, nonstop, INCESSANT griping and moaning about the narrator's brother.
